# fig8
Throughput (seeds/s) comparison for DGL, Heta and MeCache.

## run

First, place the logs from `DGL`, `Heta` (using nccl) and `MeCache` into the `log` directory.  
Specifically, logs from `baseline/dgl/run_all.py`, `baseline/heta/run_all.py` and `run_all_speed.py`.  
Second, produce figure 8.

```bash
python draw.py
```

## output

Executing `draw.py` generates two results: the figure `overall_performance.pdf` (Figure 8) and a console log as shown below.

